project_path.BBIToken: contracts/Beluga Pay (BBI) Security Audit - CoinFabrik Blog/BBIToken

findings.title: Function buyBBITokens can be used to get free tokens
findings.description: Directly calling the buyBBITokens function can bypass the fallback function and allow users to assign themselves all remaining tokens.
